## Feature Description
A clear and concise description of the feature you'd like to see implemented.

## Problem Statement
What problem does this feature solve? Why is it needed?

## Proposed Solution
Describe how you envision this feature working. Include details about:
- User interface changes
- Backend changes
- API changes
- Database changes (if any)

## Alternatives Considered
List any alternative solutions you've considered and why you prefer the proposed solution.

## Additional Context
Add any other context that might help us understand the feature request:
- [ ] User stories or use cases
- [ ] Mockups or wireframes
- [ ] Competitor analysis
- [ ] Technical constraints

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Feature works as described
- [ ] No performance degradation
- [ ] Accessible (WCAG AA compliant)
- [ ] Mobile responsive
- [ ] Browser compatible (latest Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge)

## Priority
- [ ] Low (nice to have)
- [ ] Medium (would be helpful)
- [ ] High (needed soon)
- [ ] Critical (blocks other work)
